author: breser
msg: svnauthz: Add --is option to accessof subcommand.
(cmd_table): Accept --is option on accessof and change return documention of
accessof to reflect that --is changes the return codes.
(subcommand_accessof): Explicitly initialize booleans and add booleans for
is states, handle validate of --is argument, implement checking --is
(sub_main): Add --is option, treat all SVN_ERR_AUTHZ_* errors as validation

author: rhuijben
msg: Make 'svn diff --summarize' handle repos-wc diffs to make its implementation
match all the capabilities of the normal 'svn diff'.
(diff_repos_wc): Allow passing a separate cmd baton and callback baton to
allow calling this function for summarize support.
(diff_summarize_repos_wc): New function, wrapping diff_repos_wc with a
(send_summary): Reverse add and delete when requested.

author: atm
msg: Add file which was accidentally missed during commit of HDFS-4346.

author: ggregory
msg: [VFS-442] Add an HDFS FileSystem Provider. Use current version of Hadoop dependencies.
